Class HMM

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.probability.hmm.impl.HMM

    HiddenMarkovModel

    public class HMM
extends java.lang.Object
implements HiddenMarkovModel

    Ciaran O'Reilly, Ravi Mohan

    • Constructor Detail

      • HMM

        public HMM(RandomVariable stateVariable,
           Matrix transitionModel,
           java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,Matrix> sensorModel,
           Matrix prior)
        Instantiate a Hidden Markov Model.
        Parameters:
        stateVariable - the single discrete random variable used to describe the process states 1,...,S.
        transitionModel - the transition model:
        P(Xt | Xt-1)
        is represented by an S * S matrix T where
        Tij = P(Xt = j | Xt-1 = i).
        sensorModel - the sensor model in matrix form:
        P(et | Xt = i) for each state i. For mathematical convenience we place each of these values into an S * S diagonal matrix.
        prior - the prior distribution represented as a column vector in Matrix form.
